DOC.brief_summary: The propose study investigate effect alternate footwear model workout-type occurrence running-related pain . To achieve goal participant randomly assign one four different group perform : 1 ) workout throughout week run shoe model , 2 ) alternate workout-types throughout week shoe model , 3 ) workout throughout week alternate shoe model , 4 ) alternate workout alternate shoe . Participants characterize base body alignment , strength , injury training history . Pain injury status monitor .
DOC.criteria: Subjects study include adult ( men woman ) age 19 60 , run regular basis ( minimum per week ) past 6 month , able run 60 minute continuously , could tolerate 2040km per week training , experience run related injury require stoppage 2weeks past 6 month . Only neutral pronated foot posture ( Foot Posture Index 2 8 ) recruit history surgery plantar fascia Achilles tendon , diagnosis osteoarthritis degenerative musculoskeletal disorder affect low extremity , take analgesic antiinflammatory medication 2 time per week past 4 week , take part high impact activity 2 time per week study period
